Uses of Package
uk.me.berndporr.iirj

  • Classes in uk.me.berndporr.iirj used by uk.me.berndporr.iirj 
    Class Description
    Biquad
    Contains the coefficients of a 2nd order digital filter with two poles and two zeros
    BiquadPoleState
    PoleZeroPair with gain factor
    Cascade
    The mother of all filters.
    ComplexPair
    A complex pair
    DirectFormAbstract
    Abstract form of the a filter which can have different state variables Direct form I or II is derived from it
    LayoutBase
    Digital/analogue filter coefficient storage space organising the storage as PoleZeroPairs so that we have as always a 2nd order filter
    PoleZeroPair
    It's written on the tin.
